Class User

java.lang.Object
User
public class User extends Object
User class represents a user of the application and has attributes such as username, name, lastname, password and income

      public void addExpense(ArrayList<Expense> recurringExpenses, ArrayList<Expense> nonRecurringExpenses, Expense currentExpense)
      Adds an expense to the appropriate list (recurring or non-recurring).
      Parameters:
      recurringExpenses - the list of recurring expenses
      nonRecurringExpenses - the list of non-recurring expenses
      currentExpense - the expense to add

    • findExpenses

      public ArrayList<Expense> findExpenses(String name, boolean recurring)
      Finds expenses by name and recurrence type (recurring or non-recurring).
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for
      recurring - whether to search in recurring expenses
      Returns:
      a list of matching expenses

    • deleteExpense

      public void deleteExpense(boolean recurring, int index)
      Deletes an expense by its index and recurrence type.
      Parameters:
      recurring - whether the expense is recurring
      index - the index of the expense to delete

    • editExpense

      public void editExpense(boolean recurring, int index, String name, Double amount, String category, boolean stillRecurring)
      Edits an expense by its index and updates its details.
      Parameters:
      recurring - whether the expense is recurring
      index - the index of the expense to edit
      name - the new name of the expense
      amount - the new amount of the expense
      category - the new category of the expense
      stillRecurring - whether the expense is still recurring after the edit
